body_html:
Most mobile acceleration work being done currently is for the Hexagon DSP, which can offer an order of magnitude speedup. @satok16 has been working on this and may be able to offer more details.

We may also support CUDA on Android in the future, but this would be limited to select Nvidia devices like the TX1/TX2.

We may also support CUDA on Android in the future, but this would be limited to select Nvidia devices like the TX1/TX2.
body:
Most mobile acceleration work being done currently is for the Hexagon DSP, which can offer an order of magnitude speedup. @satok16 has been working on this and may be able to offer more details.

We may also support CUDA on Android in the future, but this would be limited to select Nvidia devices like the TX1/TX2.
